Subject: Inquiry Regarding Opportunities and CV Submission

Dear Reni,

I hope this message finds you in good health. I am writing to express my interest in potential opportunities within your esteemed company and to inquire about any current or upcoming positions that may align with my skills and experience.

Attached to this email is my CV for your review. I would greatly appreciate any insights you could provide regarding suitable roles or the application process at your company.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,  
Anju Reni
